title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel

Stay hydrated in style with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle. This 32oz water bottle is not just a hydration companion, it's a statement piece with its Dreamy Field design.

Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this bottle features a double-wall insulation that keeps your drinks cold for up to 24 hours. The unique FreeSip spout allows for both sipping and swigging, offering versatility in how you drink.

The bottle comes with a built-in straw for easy sipping and a wide opening for ice, making it perfect for hot summer days. The push-button lid is not only protective but also dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. The lid also features a lock for added security and a push-to-open mechanism for convenience.

The carry loop doubles as a lock, making it easy to carry and secure your bottle. Please note that this bottle is not suitable for hot liquids. It's BPA-free and phthalate-free, ensuring your drinks are safe and free from harmful chemicals.

The bottle requires hand washing, while the lid is dishwasher safe. This product comes with a limited lifetime warranty for your peace of mind. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle is also available in 24-ounce and 40-ounce sizes.

Stay hydrated on the go with this durable, stylish, and functional water bottle designed for sports and travel.
